lazyraster 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Lazy raster

lazyraster.Rd

Read metadata only from a raster source, for later use with plotting and conversion to raster.

# importFrom raster crop # export crop # name lazyraster-methods crop.lazyraster <- function(x, y, ...) stop("cannot crop a lazyraster, use lazycrop")

lazyraster(gdalsource, sds = NULL)

as_raster(x, dim = NULL, resample = "NearestNeighbour")

as_raster(x, dim = NULL, resample = "NearestNeighbour")

Arguments

gdalsource

a file name or other source string
sds

which subdataset to use, set to 1 if in doubt (see `vapour::vapour_sds_names`)
x

a lazyraster
dim

dimensions of data to return
resample

resample method to use, see `vapour::raster_io`

Examples

sstfile <- system.file("extdata/sst.tif", package = "vapour")
lazyraster(sstfile)
#> class         : LazyRaster
#> dimensions    : 286, 143 (nrow, ncol)
#> resolution    : 0.07000000, 0.07000389 (x, y)
#> extent        : 140.00000, 150.01000, -60.01833, -39.99722 (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> crs           : <placeholder>
#> values        : 271.3500, 289.8590 (min, max - range from entire extent)
#> window extent : <whole extent>
#> window index  : <->
as_raster(lazyraster(sstfile))
#> class       : RasterLayer 
#> dimensions  : 504, 504, 254016  (nrow, ncol, ncell)
#> resolution  : 0.01986111, 0.03972443  (x, y)
#> extent      : 140, 150.01, -60.01833, -39.99722  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : NA 
#> data source : in memory
#> names       : layer 
#> values      : 271.35, 289.843  (min, max)
#> 
as_raster(lazycrop(lazyraster(sstfile), extent(142, 143, -50, -45)))
#> class       : RasterLayer 
#> dimensions  : 504, 504, 254016  (nrow, ncol, ncell)
#> resolution  : 0.002083333, 0.01000056  (x, y)
#> extent      : 141.96, 143.01, -50.00778, -44.9675  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : NA 
#> data source : in memory
#> names       : layer 
#> values      : 280.418, 284.397  (min, max)
#>
